summary: A Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Northeast Regional Office confirming a scheduled staff visit by a Facilities Management Specialist to MCC New York from August 27-29, 2019, to provide administrative support and training for new facilities staff.

persons.name: Warden McCnw York
persons.context: Addressee of the memorandum regarding a staff visit to MCC New York.

persons.name: Facilities Management Specialist
persons.context: Staff member scheduled to visit MCC New York to provide administrative support and training.

persons.name: Legional Facilities Administrator
persons.context: Contact person for questions regarding the staff visit.

connections.description: Warden is the recipient of notification about the specialist's upcoming visit to his facility.
The administrator is the point of contact for questions about the specialist's visit.

events.title: Facilities Management Specialist visit to MCC New York begins
events.description: A Facilities Management Specialist begins a multi-day visit to MCC New York to provide administrative support and training for new facilities staff.

events.title: Facilities Management Specialist visit to MCC New York ends
events.description: The scheduled staff visit by the Facilities Management Specialist concludes.

keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons memorandum dated August 7, 2019.
It confirms a scheduled staff visit by a Facilities Management Specialist to MCC New York from August 27-29, 2019.
The purpose of the visit is to provide administrative support and training for new facilities staff.
The memorandum originates from the Northeast Regional Office in Philadelphia.
